00222 template <class ViewBase>
00223 TFrameBase<ViewBase>::TFrameBase(QWidget* parent)
00224        :QWidget(parent)

00230 template <class ViewBase>
00231 void TFrameBase<ViewBase>::SetZoomToFit(bool state)
00232 {
00233        if (state != m_isZoomToFit){
00234               m_isZoomToFit = state;
00235               ViewImpl& view = GetViewRef();
00236               if (m_isZoomToFit){
00237                      m_storedTransform = view.GetTransform();
00238                      UpdateComponentsPosition();
00239                      view.UpdateFitTransform();
00240               }
00241               else{
00242                      UpdateComponentsPosition();
00243                      view.SetTransform(m_storedTransform);
00244               }
00245               UpdateButtonsState();
00246        }
00247 }
00248 
00249 
00250 template <class ViewBase>
00251 void TFrameBase<ViewBase>::SetFitMode(FitMode mode)
00252 {
00253        if (m_fitMode != mode){
00254               m_fitMode = mode;
00255               ViewImpl& view = GetViewRef();
00256               view.UpdateFitTransform();
00257               if (m_isZoomToFit){
00258                      UpdateComponentsPosition();
00259               }
00260        }
00261 }
00262 
00263 
00264 template <class ViewBase>
00265 void TFrameBase<ViewBase>::SetGridVisible(bool state)
00266 {
00267        ViewImpl& view = GetViewRef();
00268        view.SetGridVisible(state);
00269 }
00270 
00271 
00272 template <class ViewBase>
00273 void TFrameBase<ViewBase>::SetRulerVisible(bool state)
00274 {
00275        if (state != m_isRulerVisible){
00276               m_isRulerVisible = state;
00277               UpdateComponentsPosition();
00278               UpdateButtonsState();
00279        }
00280 }

00282 
00283 template <class ViewBase>
00284 void TFrameBase<ViewBase>::SetGridInMm(bool state)
00285 {
00286        ViewImpl& view = GetViewRef();
00287 
00288        if (state != view.IsGridInMm()){
00289               view.SetGridInMm(state);
00290               UpdateButtonsState();
00291        }
00292 }

00468 template <class ViewBase>
00469 void TFrameBase<ViewBase>::UpdateView()
00470 {
00471        ViewImpl& view = GetViewRef();
00472        if (m_isZoomToFit){
00473               m_storedTransform = view.GetTransform();
00474               UpdateComponentsPosition();
00475               view.UpdateFitTransform();
00476        }
00477 
00478        view.Update();
00479 }

00484 template <class ViewBase>
00485 void TFrameBase<ViewBase>::Init()
00486 {
00487        m_isButtonsPanelVisible = true;
00488        m_isButtonsPanelVertical = false;
00489        m_areScollbarsVisible = true;
00490        m_areZoomsVisible = true;
00491        m_isZoomToFitVisible = true;
00492        m_arePolylineButtonsVisible = true;
00493        m_areUserModeButtonsVisible = false;
00494        m_isStatusVisible = true;
00495        m_isStatusButtonVisible = true;
00496        m_isScrollbarsButtonVisible = true;
00497        m_isGridButtonVisible = true;
00498        m_isRulerButtonVisible = true;
00499        m_isRulerVisible = false;
00500        m_isMmButtonVisible = true;
00501        m_isUndoButtonVisible = true;
00502 
00503        m_isPixelPositionVisible = true;
00504        m_isPixelValueVisible = true;
00505        m_isMmPositionVisible = false;
00506 
00507        m_isBkActive = false;
00508        m_isZoomToFit = false;
00509        m_fitMode = FM_BOTH;
00510 }
